summary: Elon Musk calls OpenAI founder 'Scam Altman' The billionaire tycoon has also engaged in a feud with Sam Altman . Altman is the CEO of OpenAI, the AI company behind the ChatGPT bot .  Elon Musk calls OpenAI founder "Scam Altman" The AI tokens market cap stood at $25 billion at the time of writing . Both Musk and Altman are among the OpenAI co-founders .

A wave of nearly $6.5 trillion in US equity options isaboutto roll off this Friday . Tesla and other popular names sit at the heart of this quarterly triple witching event . Rocky Fishman, founder of Asym 500, called this one among the largest ever .  Citi estimates $5.8 trillion in contracts are expiring . Matthew Thompson at Little Harbor Advisors sees these expiry windows as chances to make volatility plays in his ETF strategies .

X, the platform formerly known as Twitter, is getting closer to becoming a fintech ecosystem . Users will soon be able to invest or trade directly on the app . The rollout will begin in the U.S., with Visa onboard as a launch partner, before expanding to other markets .  Research firm Emarketer sees X's 2025 revenue reaching $2.3 billion . In March, Musk folded X into his AI startup xAI in a $45 billion deal . X may face serious regulatory friction as it pushes into payments and investing .

Cathie Wood, head of Ark Investment, often buys tech stocks she believes will have a disruptive impact on the future . Wood’s funds have experienced a volatile ride this year, swinging from strong gains to sharp losses .  Cathie Wood had a remarkable gain of 153% in 2020, which helped build her reputation and attract loyal investors . Wood’s investment strategy is straightforward: Her Ark ETFs typically buy shares in emerging high-tech companies . Wood says these companies have the potential to reshape industries, but their volatility leads to major fluctuations in Ark funds' values .  Ark Innovation ETF wiped out $7 billion in investor wealth over the 10 years ending in 2024 . That made it the third-biggest wealth destroyer among mutual funds and ETFs . Morningstar analyst Amy Arnott recently said the U.S. is coming out of a three-year “rolling recession”  On June 16, Cathie Wood’s Ark Innovation ETF bought 128,163 shares of Nvidia(NVDA) That chunk of stock was valued at roughly $18.5 million . Wood started buying Nvidia stock in early April amid a brutal sell-off caused by tariff tensions and tightened export restrictions .  Nvidia reported strong fiscal first-quarter results on May 28 . China remains a key market for the chipmaker . The company forecasts revenue of $45 billion in July quarter, missing analysts’ projections by nearly $1 billion .  Nvidia closed at $145.48 on June 18, up 8.3% year-to-date and just 2.7% below its all-time high of $149.41 posted in January . Wall Street's average price target on Nvidia stock is $173.19 .  of 19% as analysts remain bullish on the company’s AI-driven growth . This story was originally reported by TheStreet on Jun 19, 2025 .

Elon Musk's long-awaited launch of a Tesla robotaxi service will be notably short of short of . The launch of the service is scheduled for this weekend . Musk: "This weekend’s long awaited launch will be the first of its kind"

Texas's new autonomous-vehicle law takes effect in September . Lawmakers urge Tesla CEO Elon Musk to submit detailed compliance plans for incoming rules . Tesla's initial robotaxi fleet may include 1020 Model Y vehicles operating only in zones deemed safest .  A delay could push back revenue projections tied to ride-hailing services and shape investor expectations for Tesla's autonomy roadmap . Competing firms and legacy automakers are monitoring Texas's framework as a potential blueprint for future deployments .

The rocket was undergoing a routine pre-launch engine firing when it failed . The blast lit up the night sky, shaking windows and rattling dishes across the area . This is the fourth major setback in six months for the Starship program .  SpaceX will likely delay its next test as it completes another technical review . SpaceX successfully caught a Starship booster last year using robotic armsnicknamed chopsticks . Musk has also floated the idea of sending Tesla-built robots to Mars as early as 2026 .

Chinese EV giant has nearly quadrupled sales in just four months . Sales are up more than 200% year-on-year in Europe's five largest auto markets . In UK alone, BYD's units jumped from 1,600 to nearly 12,000 in a year .  Former Stellantis executives are leading the charge in Germany, Spain, and Italy . Despite splashy sponsorships and showroom blitzes, it's a fragile lead . Margins are thin, brand loyalty is weak, and regulators are starting to question the role of hybrids .  This next stretch will test whether BYD is just the latest disruptor or Europe's new EV heavyweight . It will test if BYD has the infrastructure and repeat customers it needs to stay in Europe .

Elon Musk took to X, the social media site he owns, to post the results of a recent drug test . Results show he tested negative for ketamine, ecstasy, cocaine, amphetamines and other drugs a few days earlier . The action was in response to a New York Times article published 12 days prior .  A Times spokesperson said nothing Musk said or presented contradicts what we uncovered . A chatbot developed by Musk's artificial intelligence company, xAI, said the drug test "likely accurately reflects no drug use within the days prior to June 11, 2025, given the detection limits of urine tests"  Tesla is scheduled to debut its Robotaxi autonomous EV ride-hailing service on June 22 . Consumers are skeptical of the Full-Self-Driving technology that undergirds the RobotAXi proposition . The chatbot said that a live demonstration in Austin highlighted serious flaws in Tesla’s FSD .  The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is investigating Tesla’s FSD software following four crashes, including a fatal pedestrian incident, the chatbot said . The chatbot says Tesla's stock has been volatile, dropping 4% on June 17, 2025, after news of a production halt at its Austin Gigafactory .  The electric vehicle maker's shares are up 75% from 2024 and down 20% this year . Tesla faces competition from Chinese EV maker(BYDDY), General Motors(GM)and Ford .  Tesla’s era of unchallenged supremacy is likely over, due to intensified competition, declining sales, and self-inflicted brand damage, the chatbot said . "The golden age may be past, but Tesla's story isn’t finished," Grok said .

The Dan Ives Wedbush AI Revolution ETF invests in companies at the forefront of innovation . The fund offers targeted exposure to large-cap tech leaders, complemented by emerging AI disruptors . A 0.75% expense ratio is pricey, but could be worth it if the Ives strategy manages to outperform .  Dan Ives is a Managing Director and senior technology sector analyst at Wedbush Securities, one of the largest privately owned securities brokerages and asset managers in the U.S.  The ETF is passively managed, meaning it's not necessarily intended to beat the market . It provides targeted exposure to a thematic index based on a basket of stocks selected through a methodological approach . The predefined investing criteria include the inclusion in the AI 30 report .  The Dan Ives Wedbush AI Revolution ETF is well-positioned to capitalize on this momentum . The top five fund holdings, includingMicrosoft,Nvidia,Oracle,Broadcom, and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing, contribute about 25% of the total weighting . Smaller AI stocks, such asC3.ai,SoundHound AI,Innodata, andElastic NV, are also represented in the fund .  Since the fund's inception date on June 3, the ETF has returned 3.4% through June 16, compared to a 1% gain in the tech-heavy Nasdaq-100 index tracking the Invesco QQQ Trust . The fund is a great option for adding exposure to AI tech stocks without the complexity of individual stock picking .  The 10 stocks that made the cut could produce monster returns in the coming years . Consider when Netflixmade this list on December 17, 2004... if you invested $1,000 at the time of our recommendation,you’d have $659,171! The Motley Fool’s total average return is995% — a market-crushing outperformance compared to172% for the S&P 500 .  The Motley Fool recommends Broadcom, C3.ai, Elastic and Elastic . Dan Ives' Wedbush Just Launched an ETF -- Should You Buy In?

LiveOne, Inc. incurred a fourth-quarter fiscal 2025 GAAP loss of 8 cents per share compared with a loss of 3 cents a year ago . Q4 revenues plunged 37.6% year over year to $19.3 million . Despite the top-line compression, the company exceeded its full-year revenue guidance by $2.4 million .  Audio business, comprising Slacker Radio and PodcastOne, has achieved record revenues of $108.9 million for fiscal 2025 . Audio division delivered a record adjusted EBITDA of $18.2 million, exceeding expectations by more than 51%. LVO’s shares sank 11% in trading and closed the session at 77 cents on June 18, 2025 . Shares of the company have declined 37.1% in the past six months .  LiveOne posted an operating loss of $8.2 million for the quarter, significantly wider than a year ago . This deterioration was mostly due to the revenue decrease, though it was partially offset by cuts in various operating expenses . LVO generated cash and cash equivalents of $4 million compared with $7 million as of March 31, 2024 .  Dolby Laboratories, Inc. reported second-quarter fiscal 2025 non-GAAP earnings per share (EPS) of $1.34, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 3.9% . LiveOne currently carries a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold) You can seethe complete list of today’s Zacks #1 Rank stocks here .  GoPro reported first-quarter 2025 non-GAAP loss per share of 12 cents, narrower than the Zacks Consensus Estimate of a loss of 13 cents . Sonos, Inc. decreased 18.2% in the past six months . In the past year, GPRO shares have lost 65.2%.

Lawmakers want Tesla to delay rollout of robotaxis until new autonomous vehicle law takes effect in Texas . Tesla CEO Elon Musk indicated that soft launch could begin as early as this Sunday . Lawmakers say delay would allow company to align with forthcoming safety regulations .  The robotaxi program remains a focal point for Tesla investors and analysts . Early reports suggest the pilot program may use a fleet of 10 to 20 Model Y vehicles in select neighborhoods deemed safest by Tesla .

A new map detailing the North Sea's renewable energy projects highlights the significant scale of marine-based energy initiatives, including offshore wind, wave, and tidal sites . The map also outlines potential challenges these projects may face, such as the presence of oil platforms and Natura 2000 sites .  Teslafinished trading at $322.05 up 1.8% . Senra Systems, founded by exTesla (NASDAQ:TSLA) CEO Elon Musk's SpaceX engineers, aims to automate and onshore the production of defense-critical wire harnesses . Wire harnessesthe bundled cables that powereverything from satellites to dronesare still largely hand-made overseas, creating bottlenecks for U.S. military and aerospace projects .  Senra is signaling that rebuilding America's manufacturing base can be both high-tech and high-margin . Over the next six months, milestones to watch include ramp to full capacity and customer wins . Success here could set a template for modernizing other overlooked yet vital industrial supply-chain segments .

Broadcom joined the trillion-dollar club late last year . The software and chip company has been riding the AI wave as companies like Alphabet and Meta place orders for its custom AI chips . Analysts expect Broadcom’s sales to soar 22% this fiscal year and 21% in 2026 .  Nvidia is the only company in the Magnificent Seven whose sales growth surpasses Broadcom’s . Tesla's market cap is just above the $1 trillion mark . Four of the seven companies have seen their shares fall this year .  Some experts say the purpose of these groupings is to track trends, not just the most valuable companies . If the trend investors are eyeing now is AI, then swapping Tesla for Broadcom may not make sense . Another option might be to simply expand the Magnificent 7 to a Magnificent 8 .

Democratic lawmakers from Texas have asked Tesla to postpone the launch of its robotaxi service in Austin . They cite public safety and trust concerns . Tesla CEO Elon Musk has hinted that the service could start as early as this Sunday .  Texas law requires companies to seek authorisation for autonomous vehicles . New legislation could lead to permit revocation if the vehicles are deemed a public danger . Musk has been sparse with details regarding the Austin robotaxi rollout . A group of Texas lawmakers has asked Teslato delay its much-anticipated robotaxi launch in Austin until September . A new autonomous-driving law is scheduled to take effect in September . CEO Elon Musk last year stakedTesla's future on autonomous driving technology .  Current Texas law allows autonomous-vehicle firms to operate their vehicles anywhere in Texas, as long as they meet registration and insurance requirements . New legislation passed the Texas legislature last month and has not been signed by the governor . It would give state authorities the power to revoke permits if they deem a driverless vehicle "endangers the public"  Musk andTeslahave given few details about their plans for the Austin robotaxi launch . The CEO has said the Austin rollout would begin with 10 or 20 Model Y vehicles . The company will begin operating in “only the parts of Austin that we consider the safest”

OpenAI kicked off the AI revolution in the first place . The start-up has been seeking alternatives to Microsoft's Azure cloud platform . Working with Google is a major win for Google, but I see a data center infrastructure service provider as an even bigger winner from this deal .  The partnership between OpenAI and Alphabet is a big win for Alphabet's cloud business . I'll break down which AI data center stock I think is poised to benefit most from this deal . I see an even bigger winner emerging from this partnership .  CoreWeave provides critical infrastructure services to AI developers through a cloud-based model . The company signed an $11.2 billion deal with (wait for it!)... OpenAI .  Wall Street's consensus estimates for CoreWeave suggest an incredibly bullish outlook . Infrastructure services represent the next big tailwind along the AI spectrum . While OpenAI may continue to make headlines as it inks new deals and migrates from an overreliance on Microsoft .  CoreWeave went public just a few months ago . With a stock price gain of nearly 300% in just two months, the company is overbought right now . I would encourage investors to exercise some patience and wait for a pullback before piling into the stock . Shares of electric vehicle manufacturerTesla(NASDAQ: TSLA)have dropped by 21% on the year . While Tesla's core EV business continues to struggle, I think shares are poised for an epic comeback . A bullish narrative surrounding robotaxi has fueled some recent excitement in Tesla stock as of late .  Tesla investors understand that Elon Musk's vision for the company is not just to sell the most EVs . Musk has been focusing on various elements of artificial intelligence (AI) and how the technology can be used to transform Tesla . Right now, the most immediate AI use case for Tesla is commercializing autonomous driving software .  Among Microsoft, Alphabet, and Amazon, these three cloud computing giants are forecast to spend nearly $260 billion in AIcapital expenditures just this year . Investors might want to see some tangible return on investment in the form of accelerating revenue and widening profit margins .  The primary catalyst fueling Tesla stock right now seems to be the robotaxi launch . At its core, the company's self-driving technology is a software product -- meaning it carries higher profit margins than the traditional automobile business .  Tesla stock has steadily been climbing over the last month-and-a-half . But I would caution investors from buying into the idea that now is an opportunity to take advantage of a dip . Musk himself has made it explicitly clear that the robotaxi will not be a meaningful financial contributor for Tesla for at least a year .  Tesla stock will outperform its "Magnificent Seven" peers over the next six months . But I actually think investing in the stock is a bit risky at the moment . A more prudent approach to an investment in Tesla is to see how the Robotaxi business scalers in the coming months while learning how impactful this new segment is for the entire business .
